i've had no time to even really think. i hate the word disapointment. it's sad and a horrible feeling. but of course i get over these things and for the first time i put it behind me and look forward for the next day.

school sucks. everything is changing. friends and the academic...as it does every year. but this year it's just way different. i don't like it at all. different campuses make it even harder. but it shouldn't be that hard. there are some changing of feelings for sure. just my luck!

everything is all better for the most part. i miss camp like a bitch though. and everyone there. but they are coming home soon! FUCK YA!

wow...today sucked soo much. everything went wrong that could have possibly gone wrong without involving deaths. from plans getting ruined, to friends priorities and feelings changing, to them not caring and giving enough or any time when they aren't doing anything themselves. holding a phone to your face isn't that fucking hard. or going the extra step to involve others. sorry, this matter shouldn't even have room on my live journal because these people are nothing to me anymore. i don't need 'em. bye.

seeing shelbi and tye today. fun. i love lauren. happy. anchor man is out. good buisness.

this is the first time that i didn't let him know how i was feeling. this is the first time that i finally felt free. this is the first time that i am at a loss for words. this is the first time that reality has struck so intensly but with a posotive outcome. this is the first time that i don't need him and know it, but at the same time knowing i don't need him makes me want him. this is not the first time he has done something wrong. but this is the first time i haven't told him he was wrong and a lier. this is the first time in a while that i can say i haven't cried today. this is the first sign of being okay. 

LAUERN IS HOME!
finding out stuff isn't always a good thing. escpecially all in one night. ugh. everything is better for the most part. things have been weird lately though, and kinda sad.

i just got home. Santa Barbara sucked. but i made the best of it. i miss Lauren. my life sucks right now. i hate it when friends lie. or when they say they are your best friend and just don't tell you anything. escpecially when that person made an impression that they actualy cared and didn't or doesn't actually. actually twice....how weird. are there no feelings boy? is there no sentimet boy?  

Love: An intense emotional attachment.

Love: A person who is the object of deep or intense affection or attraction; beloved. Often used as a term of endearment. 

Love: An expression of one's affection: "send my love"

hm..was there any love?
